item.title: I Join the Área Xbox team.
item.description: Área Xbox On August 2020, I joined the Spanish press site Área Xbox, where I work covering sector news, doing translation and localization tasks, and the creation of opinion pieces. I carry out game reviews and attend press events as well. Work These are the news and opinion pieces I’ve published since then:
